INGREDIENTS:

 • Chicken -1/2 kg (with bone)
 • Ginger -Garlic Paste-1 tsp
 • Turmeric Powder-less than 1/4 tsp
 • Chilli powder- 1/2tsp
 • Pepper powder- 1/2tsp
 • Coriander powder- 1/4tsp 
 • Garam masala- 1/4tsp
 • Cumin powder-2 pinch 
 • Curd-1 tbsp 
 • Lemon Juice-1 tbsp 
 • Salt
 • Finely chopped Curry leaves -1tsp 
 • Finely Chopped Coriander leaves-1tsp 
 • Cornflour-3-4tbsp 
 • Rice flour-1tbsp 
 • Oil -for frying 

 For Sauting

 • Veg oil-1tsp
 • Ginger-garlic paste-1/2tsp
 • Curry leaves-1 string 
 • Green chilli-1 (slits) 
 • Chilli powder-1/4tsp 
 • Pepper powder-less than 1/4 tsp 
 • Garam masala-2 pinch 
 • Chilli Garlic sauce -1tbsp 
 • Lemon juice-1 tsp 
 • Colour-(opt) 

 METHOD: 

 1. Cut the chicken into small pieces. 
 2. Wash them well and add 1 tbsp of salt and add 3 cup of water and mix well. 
 3. Keep in the fridge overnight . 
 4. Take out the chicken and wash again and drain . 
 5. In a bowl add ,chopped curryleaves,coriander leaves,curd,lemon juice,cumin powder,garam masala,coriander powder,chilli powder,turmeric powder,corn flour ,ginger -garlic paste,rice flour and salt . 
 6. Add chicken and mix them well.. Keep aside for 15 minutes . 
 7. Heat oil in a kadai and shallow fry the pieces till well cooked .. Drain to a kitchen tissue and keep aside . 
 8. Now heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan and add ginger garlic paste ..Saute for a minute. 
 9. Then add curry leaves ,green chilli and sauté . 
 10. Then lower the heat and add all the powders .. Saute them till the raw smell goes . 
 11. Then add chilli garlic sauce ,lemon juice and food colour .(If u don’t have chilli garlic sauce ,then add chopped garlic along with green chilli and add chilli sauce ..) 
 12. Add 3 tbsp of water and allow to boil ..Check the salt . 
 13. Now add the fried chicken and mix well till all the pieces and well coated with the sauce . 
 14. If u want u can fry some curry leaves and green chilli and garnish in the top. 
 15. Just try this and tell me how was it ..I bet u r going to like it for sure. 
 16. Note : Adjust the spice level accordingly ..I did for my kids so decreased the spice level .. I put colour to get nice pics ,otherwise no need to add colour .. and don’t worry looking at the long list of ingredients ..its all there in our kitchen all the time ;) 
 17. If u don’t have time to brine the chicken (over night soaking in salt water ) u can marinate and keep in the fridge for 1 hour ..Brining will make the chicken juicy and tender . 
 18. U can omit last step ,just fry the chicken and have it like that :) .. Some times some people may don’t prefer sauce in chicken 65
